mapper.select: select no, title, writer, name, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, hit from data d, member m where d.writer=m.id order by no desc

select no, title, writer, name, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, hit from data d, member m where d.writer=m.id and
title like '%'||#{search}||'%' content like '%'||#{search}||'%' title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or content like '%'||#{search}||'%' writer like '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into data(no, title, content, writer , fileName) values(data_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: update data set title=#{title},content=#{content} ,fileName=#{fileName} where no=#{no}
update data set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
